list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a straight line or plane that touches a curve or curved surface at a point, but if extended does not cross it at that point.
a completely different line of thought or action.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he quickly went off on a tangent about wrestling
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh nhanh chóng đi trên một tiếp tuyến về đấu vật

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the trigonometric function that is equal to the ratio of the sides (other than the hypotenuse) opposite and adjacent to an angle in a right triangle.
(of a line or plane) touching, but not intersecting, a curve or curved surface.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this curve is tangent to the average cost curve
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đường cong này là tiếp tuyến với đường cong chi phí trung bình
